summary: Executive profile focused on broadcast management, media sales, radio station programming and on-air broadcast execution.
skills: Media Consulting and Digital Content Analysis
Digital Content Delivery and Music Scheduling

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Our team creates and develops national programming for radio stations across the country. We syndicate and distribute radio shows, imaging packages and media content. Working as a Consultant with local radio stations, national radio shows, major record labels and social media integrators of media.

experience.title: Sr. Director
experience.description: Directed and coordinated affiliate sales and on-air personnel. Developed, maintained and coordinated syndicated radio programs. Developed and managed 24 hour national radio formats.

experience.title: Operations Director, Brand Manager and On-Air Personality
experience.description: Executed content delivery for WWDM-FM. Managed daily operations of WWDM-FM, coordinated promotions for the local sales team and on-air production. Ranked #1 with Persons both 18-34 and 24-54.

education.degree: Associate of Arts in Mass Communications
